body.p: There should be one on the following paragrap:
Tu vas faire ta propre own lessive, je présume.
And another one, with an audio clip:

Tu vas faire ta Il téléphone à moi.
lessive, je présume.
And another one, with an audio and translation:

Tu vas faire ta Il téléphone à moi.
He telephones me lessive, je présume.

There should be two popups in the following paragraphs, enabled via hover over the words
electrolytes
and
strong electrolytes

One important property of the resulting solution is its ability to conduct electricity. Conductivity of a solution can be tested with an apparatus such as the one seen below. Solutions that contain charged particles (ions) allow the electric current to flow between the anodes. This will complete the circuit and cause the light bulb to light up. Substances, like NaCl, that conduct electricity when dissolved in water are called
electrolytes
substances that produces ions when dissolved in water
. More specifically NaCl is a
strong electrolyte
substance that dissociates or ionizes completely when dissolved in water
because it conducts electricity very well.

Like matter, energy comes in different types. One scheme classifies energy into two types: (i) potential energy
energy of a particle or system of particles derived from relative position, composition, or condition
, the energy an object has because of its relative position, composition, or condition, and (ii) kinetic energy
energy of a moving body, in joules, equal to 1/2 mv2 (where m = mass and v = velocity)
, the energy that an object possesses because of its motion. Water at the top of a waterfall or dam has potential energy because of its position; when it flows downward through generators, it has kinetic energy that can be used to do work and produce electricity in a hydroelectric plant. A battery has potential energy because the chemicals within it can produce electricity that can do work.
